notesStmt.note: Strophe endings (every second verse, rhymed ים-) denoted by a colon; catchword at end (bottom left verso?) of each fol; No. 255 recto contains the last 16 verses of Ibn Gabirol's Azharah שמור לבי (Davidson, Thesaurus of Medieval Hebrew poetry. New York : JTS, 1924, 1482ש) on the positive commandments, parallel to, in the published edition D. Yarden: Shire ha-ḳodesh le-Rabi Shemuʹel Ibn Gabirol / Dov Yarden [ed.]. Jerusalem, 1971-1973, p. 412-413, ll. 167-182; 255 verso: under the heading מצות לא תעשה, the beginning of Ibn Gabirol's Azharah בצל שדי אחסה (TMHP 1278ב) on the negative commandments, ibid, pp. 414-415, ll. 1-17. No. 256 contains ibid pp. 418-424 ll. 55-130.
Condition: non-consecutive, complete; lacuna between Halper 255 and 256.
